statusLine.command: bash -c 'PR_JSON=$(gh pr view --json number,url 2>/dev/null); if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then PR_NUM=$(echo "$PR_JSON" | jq -r ".number"); PR_URL=$(echo "$PR_JSON" | jq -r ".url"); PR="#$PR_NUM $PR_URL"; else PR="none"; fi; BRANCH=$(git branch --show-current); REMOTE="origin/$BRANCH"; STATUS=$(git status --porcelain -b | head -1 | grep -o "ahead [0-9]*" || echo "synced"); echo "[Dir: codex_plus | Local: $BRANCH ($STATUS) | Remote: $REMOTE | PR: $PR]"'
